title: Daily reminder lee sin has 350 MOVESPEED
body:
lower it to 325, he is blind

ty rito

{{champion:64}}

edit: bonus video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=91Y4mDTAxjE

replies.body:
Well yeah, everyone knows blind people are insanely fast.

That's why they tie dogs to them, it's to prevent them from going so fast they leave a damn trail of fire everywhere.

At least, that's how I think it works.
{{champion:75}} Sorry guys, I was busy barking at the mailman for two minutes.  Don't worry, I TP'd top so I could begin my upvote farming.
And R is dual-stun/knockback tactical nuke.

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0ZHaGKsQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-15T13:46:00.809+0000)
>
> And R is dual-stun/knockback tactical nuke.

and potential escape if you put Q on a target while the enemy team surround you

To be fair that's pretty cool and is a legit escape---

Oh shit I said something good about Lee Sin. Uh... What I meant was that his scalings are too high and he has too much mobility and LC big play$!!!!
His R does more damage than a tactical nuke but I understand what you're trying to say

Well, it's fair for Lee Sin to do that much damage with his ult. After all, he built an item.

/sarcasm
e gives true sight
350 movespeed isn't high. An eggplant has 350 movespeed. Do you know how fast eggplants are in real life?
A tiny ninja is 335. A freaking plane is 325. Why is a blind dude faster than a plane?

That same blind dude can magically fly to shit by hitting them with "sound power".

That plane guy has unlimited ammo and doesn't ever use the fact that HE IS FLYING to his advantage.

This "tiny ninja" is a electrically charged rat. Basically ninja Pikachu.

If you try to apply logic to League, nothing will work out.
And a sorcerer with mastery over time such that he can peer into the timelines itself throws little cogwheels at his enemies or lobs ticking bombs somewhere instead.

{{champion:245}} Zilean, if you have so much control over time magic, why do you-
{{champion:26}} *Throws bomb* FOR SCIIIIIIEEEEEENCE!!!
{{champion:245}} ...that explains a LOT.

According to Zilean's lore, he was able to travel through time, but he can't change the out-come of events. He can freeze time, but that doesn't help either.

For reference, Ekko anchors himself at a set place and time and can only go *back* to it. Where as Zilean never had any such anchor, resulting in chrono-displesia. A disorder that causes his mind to travel randomly through is lifetime separate from his body (For reference: read Slaughter house 5).
Lower his MS by 25 and give it to Morde!
All hail Morde, who es numero uno.
Somehow I imagined Morde as a Shakespearean actor reciting MacBeth for a moment.
Alas, poor Yorick.

he can actually see more clear than you and i.
due to hes immense perception skills he can see even clearer than if he had eyes that can see.

and even if you are blind, that doesn't mean you should run slower :P
No, but having some of the highest mobility in the game should not come alongside the 2nd highest base ms in the game

take away hes ms he loses some mobility..
OHH i see what you guys are saying.

hes mobility is too powerful :0. meh dodge he Q lol.

Yeah it's not like{{champion:53}} Hitboxes are {{champion:412}} weird or anything{{champion:420}}. I mean {{champion:31}} outlines totally {{champion:32}} give you {{champion:53}} an accurate {{champion:99}} perception of when the {{champion:412}} skill will hit or{{champion:53}} not.
More Lee sin qq threads great just what we need more of...
QQ is his engagement pattern, though
Because W, Q, R, Q, wasn't enough mobility.
In the best of worlds Lee Sin would lose 15 movements speed to 335 and morde's ms would be buffed by 15 netting him a halfdecent 340.

Riot logic: Mordekaiser who has short ranged spells, no real mobility, and no cc has far less movespeed than a champion with multiple sources of both mobility and CC, as well as more range and better scaling (both defensively and offensively).

k
blind man can run faster then a horse:{{champion:120}} because logic?
To be fair, {{champion:120}} runs slower than a clown{{champion:35}} , a viking{{champion:2}} , and MJ{{champion:91}}

I feel there should be a Debonair Talon skin that makes him look like young MJ. 

*successful assassination* "You've been hit by, you've been struck by, a smooth criminal"
he should get one of those blind people sticks and then wiggle it and move at 150 movepseed so he doesnt accidentally hit a wall or an enemy turret or fountain

The two nerfs I would make

1. MS down to 325
2. Pre-root on ulti
Do you mean that stupid stun that you get before you get knocked back by his kick?, because I HATE THAT STUPID STUN
Yeah that one
~~Balanced~~ THAT THING IS SooooooOO UNFAIR
Apparently it exists to help him line it up where he targets it. It's like poppy's charge, but with a looong animation time.
It is basically a 0.75 second stun, then a 1.5 second knockback into the enemy team

That's an unfair representation of what the skill does.

A more accurate description would be that he kicks back your elo for tons of damage.
Yet lee somehow only has <50% winrate
My guess is people purposly lose so he doesn't get nerfed.
It is more of people fooling around with him, and his really high popularity.
Lee Sin has never been put in a place lower than S-tier since he was made.
i feel like right now he is in the middle of the pack. not insanely strong but not weak either
This is pretty much always the case.
Lee was actually low tier on release.
And he was hotfix-buffed faster than you can type "OP".
i think {{champion:421}} passive would have been perfect for the blind monk
I think he needs it, he's pretty immobile.
You mean to tell me a lean athletic marshal arts master moves fast? Would have never guessed.

You ever checked the way he walks? There's no level of efficiency there. Have you also looked at the statistics between fastest blind and non-blind men? Both these guys are faster than I'll ever be, but the blind guy is substantially slower than the  guy who can see.
